titles.title: Ending Duplicative Subsidies for Electric Vehicles Act
Ending Duplicative Subsidies for Electric Vehicles Act
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to prevent double dipping between tax credits and grants or loans for clean vehicle manufacturers.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Ending Duplicative Subsidies for Electric Vehicles Act
This bill prohibits duplicative subsidies (i.e., loans, grants, or tax credits) for manufacturers of new clean electric vehicles.
